definition: to control/to dominate/to monopolize
handle
to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
indecisive (idiom)

sentences.english: She kept holding me inside her.
sentences.chinese: 她把持着让我一直在她身体里。

sentences.english: Yet there are even kindergartens and pre-schools that hold graduations.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，甚至幼儿园和学前班把持着毕业生。

sentences.english: My love for you is like diarrhea, I just can't hold it.
sentences.chinese: 我对你的爱就像是泻肚子一样，让我把持不住。

sentences.english: But so few people ca fantjust liketic hold it.
sentences.chinese: 信心铭直解但少有人可操作把持它。

sentences.english: The scoreline followed a run of six clean sheets in seven games for Reina.
sentences.chinese: 在七场比赛中，雷纳把持的大门保持了六场零封对手。

sentences.english: In the vacant sea, back and forth dominates ship's steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 在茫茫然的汪洋，来回把持船的方向盘。

sentences.english: Stable envirogluvtm quality is a key factor in the control of chromatic aberration .
sentences.chinese: 稳不退的油不朱质量是把持色不差的关头成不合。

sentences.english: So control ink film thickness is an important means for color reduction.
sentences.chinese: 所以把持不朱膜薄量是色彩还原的不主给霸术。

sentences.english: QuanGan YanSong father and son holding, the army incompetence.
sentences.chinese: 权奸严嵩父子把持朝政，军队无能。

sentences.english: The bear market would still be in control.
sentences.chinese: 那是仍然由熊市把持的点位。

sentences.english: There is a gulf between flirting and unwanted sexual advances so beware.
sentences.chinese: 调情与意外的性进展之间只一步之遥，要谨慎把持。

sentences.english: There's no solution if you keep dithering around.
sentences.chinese: 如果你一直把持不定，将没有解决的方法。

sentences.english: Party fools and plug-uglies like Ley permeated the state and military structures.
sentences.chinese: 党内象莱伊之流的混蛋和流氓把持了政府与军事机构。

sentences.english: A bit-by-bit abatement of government control over business.
sentences.chinese: 政府逐渐撤消对经营活动的把持。

sentences.english: Sananda: Yes, it is all right to control nuisance bugs.
sentences.chinese: 是的，把持讨厌的虫子是适当的。

sentences.english: Who will chair the meeting is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 谁将主理主办把持会议，还不得而知。

definition: power/authority
to control/in control of
to suppress/to muzzle/to gag
to coax/to beguile/to win over
to covet/to long for/to lust after
to wield (power etc)
to wield (political etc) power/be in power
in charge (of a position etc)/the person in charge/responsible
forced submission/to exploit advantage to force sb to do one's bidding
to dip a finger (idiom); fig. to get one's finger in the pie/to get a share of the action/abbr. for 染指於鼎|染指于鼎
to check and balance (power)/checks and balances
to rope in/fig. to involve sb/to entice
to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc)/to hold as one's personal fiefdom
to compel sb to obey/to force into submission/to subjugate
to occupy by force/to seize/to dominate
lit. to hide the sky with one hand/to hide the truth from the masses
